text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to get a liquor server license?
text.Response A: Sure, it’s a good idea to have a license if you plan to serve alcohol.  The license is issued by the state, so you’ll need to look into the specific requirements in your state.  Generally speaking, you need to be at least 21 years old, pass a test to demonstrate your knowledge of responsible alcohol service, and pay a fee.  You might also need to submit fingerprints and a background check.
text.Response B:
Sure, I can help you with that. In order to get a liquor server license, you will need to meet the following requirements:

- Be at least 18 years old
- Complete a responsible service of alcohol (RSA) training course
- Apply for a liquor server license from your local council
- Pass a police check

Once you have met these requirements, you will be able to apply for a liquor server license. The process may vary depending on your local council, so it's best to check with them for specific instructions.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

331.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to get a liquor server license?

Response A

Sure, it’s a good idea to have a license if you plan to serve alcohol. The license is issued by the state, so you’ll need to look into the specific requirements in your state. Generally speaking, you need to be at least 21 years old, pass a test to demonstrate your knowledge of responsible alcohol service, and pay a fee. You might also need to submit fingerprints and a background check.

Response B

Sure, I can help you with that. In order to get a liquor server license, you will need to meet the following requirements:

- Be at least 18 years old
- Complete a responsible service of alcohol (RSA) training course
- Apply for a liquor server license from your local council
- Pass a police check

Once you have met these requirements, you will be able to apply for a liquor server license. The process may vary depending on your local council, so it's best to check with them for specific instructions.
